comments.body:
Docs should be in the 3rd person.

So "DefinesClass determines whether..." and "DefinesClass.apply returns true if...". Not "determine" and "return".
My understanding is that docs should be in imperative. I'll double-check.

If you're happy to accept a Java style guide, there's this:

> + Use 3rd person (descriptive) not 2nd person (prescriptive). 
> The description is in 3rd person declarative rather than 2nd person imperative.
> Gets the label. (preferred)
> Get the label. (avoid)

http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/documentation/index-137868.html#styleguide
Nice, I'll do it this way.
